Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: seen object from office,ran out followed object with eyes disappear into distance
trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Orange
There were no other sightings in Orange on or around June 25th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsIn office talking with co-worker ,noticed an object in sky relecting sun light through office window.Ran out with co-worker and watched object go north east then turn north,object looked as if it was spinning or a slight wobble to it and would reflect sun than go dull grey,it was hoovering for a few seconds than dropped about 50ft and shot back up and hoovered,then went north east and slowly away from our sight.
